TEXT.English: [H1]Orion's Limited Religions Mod[\H1][NEWLINE][SPACE]Welcome to Orion's Civ4 mod customiser! To turn components on or off, please edit the respective values in the GlobalDefinesAlt.xml file. Here is the current status for each component:
